ARABIC: فَأَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِمْ رَسُولًا مِّنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and sent a Messenger to them from themselves: 'Worship Allah. You have no god other than Him! So will you not have taqwa?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We sent to them an apostle from among them (who said): "Worship God, for you have no other god but He. Will you not take heed and fear God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We sent among them a Messenger from among themselves, saying: "Serve Allah; you have no god other than He. Do you have no fear?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent to them a Messenger from among their own people who told them, "Worship God; He is your only Lord. Will you then not have fear of Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We sent among them a Noble Messenger from among them (saying), “Worship Allah, you do not have any other God except Him; so do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We sent to them a Messenger from among themselves (saying): "Worship Allah! You have no other God but Him. Will you not then have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We sent among them an apostle from among them, saying: Serve Allah, you have no god other than Him; will you not then guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We sent amongst them a Messenger of themselves, saying, 'Serve God! You have no god other than He. Will you not be godfearing?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And we sent among them a messenger of their own, saying: Serve Allah, Ye have no other Allah save Him. Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and sent a messenger to them from among themselves: "Worship God alone. You have no deity other than Him. Will you not then fear God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We sent amongst them an apostle from amongst themselves, saying: worship Allah, for you there is no god but he; will ye then not fear Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We sent them an apostle from among themselves, saying, ‘Worship Allah! You have no other god besides Him. Will you not then be wary [of Him]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We sent to them a messenger from among themselves, (saying), "Worship Allah! ye have no other god but Him. Will ye not fear (Him)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We sent to them a Messenger from among themselves (saying): "Worship Allah! You have no other Ilah (God) but Him. Will you not then be afraid (of Him i.e. of His Punishment because of worshipping others besides Him)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We sent to them a Messenger from themselves, saying: 'Worship Allah, for you have no god except He. Will you not be cautious'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves: “Serve God. You have no god other than Him. Will you not be cautious?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:32] And We sent among them a messenger of their own, namely, Hūd, saying, ‘Worship God! You have no other god besides Him. Will you not then be wary?’, of His punishment and become believers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We sent among them) and We sent to them (a messenger of their own) of their own lineage (saying: Serve Allah) saying: declare Allah's divine Oneness. (Ye have no other god save Him) you have no other god except the One in Whom I command you to believe. (Will ye not ward off (evil)) the worship of other than Allah?
